sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import L from 'leaflet'; import 'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css'; import 'leaflet.heat'; import './HeatMap.css'; // Fix for default markers in Leaflet with React delete L.Icon.Default.prototype._getIconUrl; L.Icon.Default.mergeOptions({ iconRetinaUrl: require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-icon-2x.png'), iconUrl: require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-icon.png'), shadowUrl: require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-shadow.png'), }); const HeatMap = () => { // ... (keep all existing state and logic unchanged) const mapRef = useRef(null); const mapInstance = useRef(null); const heatmapLayer = useRef(null); const markersGroup = useRef(null); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('density'); const [timeOfDay, setTimeOfDay] = useState('current'); const [selectedZone, setSelectedZone] = useState(null); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [showLegend, setShowLegend] = useState(true); const [showStatistics, setShowStatistics] = useState(true); // ... (keep all existing functions unchanged) return (
{/* Enhanced Header */}
🗺️

Tourist Safety Monitoring

Live Heatmap Dashboard

Real-time interactive tourist distribution mapping across Delhi with advanced statistical analysis

LIVE DATA
{/* Enhanced Controls Panel */}
👁️
⏰
{/* Enhanced Main Content */}
{/* Enhanced Map Container */}
{/* Enhanced Legend */} {showLegend && (
🎨

{legendConfig.title}

{legendConfig.description}

{legendConfig.items.map((item, index) => (
{item.icon}
{item.label} {item.value}
{item.description}
))}
Updates every 30s • Live from {delhiTouristZones.length} zones
)} {isLoading && (

Loading map data...

)}
{/* Enhanced Statistics Panel */}
{/* Live Statistics */}

📊 Live Statistics

LIVE
👥
{stats.total} Total Tourists
↗
✅
{stats.active} Currently Active
→
📴
{stats.offline} Offline
↘
🚨
{stats.alerts} Active Alerts
→
{/* Enhanced Insights */} {showStatistics && (

📈 Advanced Insights

🎯
Peak Activity {insights.peakHour}
🏆
Most Active {insights.mostActiveZone.name}
🛡️
Safest Zone {insights.safestZone.name}
⚡
Avg Response {insights.avgResponseTime} min
{/* Risk Distribution */}

🎯 Risk Distribution Analysis

🟢 Low Risk {insights.riskDistribution.low}
🟡 Medium Risk {insights.riskDistribution.medium}
🔴 High Risk {insights.riskDistribution.high}
)} {/* System Status */}

🖥️ System Status

ONLINE
Last Update {new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}
Auto Refresh Every 30s
View Mode {viewMode.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + viewMode.slice(1)}
Zones Monitored {delhiTouristZones.length}
Safety Score {insights.avgSafetyScore}/5 ⭐
{/* Selected Zone Details Modal */} {selectedZone && (

📍 {selectedZone.name}

{selectedZone.location}

{getTimeBasedData(selectedZone)} Current Tourists
{selectedZone.details.safetyRating}/5 Safety Rating
{selectedZone.risk.toUpperCase()} Risk Level
🎯 Key Attractions
{selectedZone.details.attractions.map((attraction, index) => ( {attraction} ))}
)}
); }; export default HeatMap;
